summary: Completed testing of Ocean E-commerce new social features. Backend APIs are working excellently (92.6% success rate). Frontend multi-language support is working correctly. However, some frontend integration issues remain with navigation links and login flow from previous iterations.

ui_bugs.issue: Compare and Shopping Lists navigation links not visible in header for authenticated users
ui_bugs.details: Links may be hidden or not properly rendered in header navigation

integration_issues.issue: Login state from previous sessions causing authentication conflicts
integration_issues.details: Previous login session interfering with new login attempts

integration_issues.issue: Follow button click does not show immediate visual feedback
integration_issues.details: Button state change or follower count update not immediately visible

passed_tests: Multi-language support - Turkish language switching works correctly
Multi-language support - Chinese language switching works correctly
Multi-language support - Language selector shows correct indicators (TR, ZH, EN)
Product Comparison - ðŸ“Š button found and clickable on product cards
Product Detail Page - Seller info section displays correctly
Follow Seller - Follow button is present and clickable on product detail pages
Compare page - Accessible via direct URL (/compare)
Shopping Lists page - Accessible via direct URL (/shopping-lists)
Backend APIs - All social feature endpoints working (Follow Seller, Product Comparison, Shared Lists, Recently Viewed)
Backend APIs - Multi-language header support working for all 6 languages
Backend Authentication - Login API working correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: 1) Fix header navigation - ensure Compare (ðŸ“Š) and Shopping Lists (ðŸ“‹) links are visible for authenticated users. 2) Fix login session persistence issue causing authentication conflicts. 3) Improve Follow Seller visual feedback - ensure button state changes or follower count updates are immediately visible.

success_percentage.backend: 92.6% - All social feature APIs working correctly
success_percentage.frontend: 70% - Language switching works, social features present but navigation and feedback issues
